message.body: I was just about to text you I forgot I am shooting a round table for Sirius raido at 9:30. The show ends at 12:00 I'll call you on my ride back. What
do I do about photos being used without my permission in international magazines. I know the actress and I'm thinking of emailing the publication with t
he original untouched copy and asking for a correction. It's five photos in a big print article. What should I do??
email the pub AND the actress.
Oh I emailed her ass. Trust me. Do I send the original to prove its mine or just offer to send it?
I know you're right. I'm just broken hearted. It's a BIG spread. I am ordering it in the Internet. I've been in it before, but it's a big one. I'll
call you as SOON as I am done its supposed to end at noon but don't know how long I'll have to hang but shouldn't be too long.
goodnight. have a great shoot in the am. talk to you tomorrow.
So THIS is going to be a fresh hell. A bunch of film "historians" and "insiders" sitting around a big table eating a meal and discussing Grindhouse Cine
ma. Not a breakfast meal, a MEAL for prerecord I know NO ONE at the table..except my one friend. SO STRANGE. Call you this afternoon.

weird. "insiders", like they sat "inside" a theatre for a matinee? is this a red carpet event also? jeez.
remember what hollywood USED TO be?
Well "they" also aren't all here yet. Lets see how old these peeps are to discuss 1970s cinema..no red carpet..it's going to be boaring talk talk talk talk.
